name: Changing Together
description:
Changing Together is a story about a relationship. It's about commitment, and how it changes you.

Content Warnings, etc, are in the game. Please use the fullscreen button in the lower right for the best experience.

Also note the game is over 18,000 words, a novella, so it might take you a while to get through, especially if you're a slower reader.

Thank you for playing my game. If you like it, I hope you'll consider throwing me a donation or reading some of my other works at poetfox.com!
